snippet: Martellus Bennett, the chatty new player on a businesslike squad, has bonded with his teammates. The Giants hope he will be an improvement at tight end after they lost Jake Ballard.
abstract: New York Giants hope Martellus Bennett will be an improvement at tight end after losing Jake Ballard this off-season.
lead_paragraph: Martellus Bennett, the chatty new player on a businesslike squad, has bonded with his teammates. The Giants hope he will be an improvement at tight end after they lost Jake Ballard.

headline.seo: Martellus Bennett Lightens Mood for Giants
headline.main: Tight End Means Business as He Lightens Mood for Giants
headline.print_headline: Tight End Means Business As He Lightens the Mood
